content: a third time eyelet section note this section is repeated a number of times but the number of k stitches on each row shown by the x will vary see pattern below for details of how many stitches to do on each row row e1 k x stitches then *yo k2tog repeat from * to last stitch kfb into last stitch row e2 pfb p to end row e3 k x stitches then *yo k2tog repeat from * to last stitch kfb into last stitch row e4 pfb p to end row e5 k x stitches then *yo k2tog repeat from * to last stitch kfb into last stitch stockinette section b row sb1 pfb p to end row sb2 k to last stitch kfb in that last stitch row sb3 to sb6 repeat row sb1 and sb2 twice more the shawl cast on 4 stitches row 1-16 garter section 20 sts at end of section row 17-21 stockinette section a 25 sts at end of section
